<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probe_script_item"><x_nuvo_diag_probe_script_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Performance tab is either 0 or empty</name><order/><probe display_value="Facilities Devices">ea54a4818733ea104cc4eb183cbb3508</probe><script><![CDATA[var zeroDuration = gs.getDurationDate('0 0:0:0');
var encodedQuery = 'total_unplanned_downtime=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_unplanned_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_planned_downtime=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_planned_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_downtime=0^ORtotal_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_uptime_duration=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_uptime_durationISEMPTY' + '^total_uptime=0^ORtotal_uptimeISEMPTY' + '^fault_count=0^ORfault_countISEMPTY' + '^mtbf=' + zeroDuration + '^ORmtbfISEMPTY' + '^total_unplanned_business_downtime=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_unplanned_business_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_planned_business_downtime=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_planned_business_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_business_downtime=0^ORtotal_business_downtimeISEMPTY' + '^total_business_uptime_duration=' + zeroDuration + '^ORtotal_business_uptime_durationISEMPTY' + '^total_business_uptime=0^ORtotal_business_uptimeISEMPTY' + '^business_fault_count=0^ORbusiness_fault_countISEMPTY';
new HealthCheckProbeUtils().getRecordsCount('x_nuvo_eam_facilities_devices', encodedQuery);
]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probe_script_item</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 11:58:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>aa54a4818733ea104cc4eb183cbb3517</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Performance tab is either 0 or empty</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Health Scan Processor" source="x_nuvo_health_scan">3f4a67a593241a10052ef5cd0bba10f0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probe_script_item_aa54a4818733ea104cc4eb183cbb3517</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 11:58:11</sys_updated_on><threshold>0</threshold></x_nuvo_diag_probe_script_item></record_update>
